column5: Dad, you're right, I'm going to like this board LOL ...fellow conspirators, this is going to be fun. I don't know if I will get down to the get together with Dad, and every child knows not to outfish their parents otherwise, they will be tossed overboard. Dad tried it last year even without me outfishing him, he pushed me right off his dock, of course he went into the water as well and I made sure he hit the water first. So I think I get a freebie.

Hello Teressa and welcome to OFC. You'd be doing yourself an injustice if you don't come to the gathering at Lakair on Saturday, they'll be lot's going on with a big fish fry in the late afternoon. TJ cooks some of the best fish I've ever eaten.
hmmmm fish fry? i'm in LOL It will be nice to meet evryone and spend the extra time with Dad
Beware the inebriated bear.  JF
A warm welcome to OFC Teressa...Looking forward to reading your posts in the near future

Hello everyone, Just thought I would jump in and introduce myself as well. I am "Big Cliff's" daughter. I grew up in the French River area hunting and fishing. I have raised my daughter to be a fisher-woman as well and we go every chance we get.  My boyfriend, daughter and I have a farm in Wahnapitae with a variety of animals including goats, wild turkeys, rabbits and muskovey ducks. I am looking forward to getting to know everyone here. Thanks Dad for refering me to this site, and thanks Roy for helping me to get activated.
welcome

Welcome Teresa.  You grew up in the area the my wife and I simply love.  Unmatched Scenery, mostly unspoiled, and great fishing.  I'll be up that way just next week - and two 2 weeks this coming September.  Hey - I am looking forward to meeting Mr. Big Cliff at Lakair next week.  It will be great to put a face to a board name.  (At least, I hear that he's planning to come up).
Hello to you! Nice to have another of the finer gender aboard...LOL!
welcome . nice to see other's from the Sudbury area lol
Welcome Teressa, you come from a fine family  Look forward to reading your posts and reports in the future.  Also looking forward to the Cliff mischievous side of you too  Joey
You have goats??!!Love my goats.Welcome aboard. Joe

Welcome Teressa! I met your father 25 years ago (we getting old Cliff) on the French River on my first trip there. My buddy and I got shut out and Cliff told us of Flat Rapids Camp and we fished for many, many years there after that and caught lots of great fish., Your Dad is one of the good ones, and the apple never falls too far from the tree, I hear .
welcome Teresa...
Welcome to our home Terresa, I have three dogs,one cat and a Siamese fighting fish named blue and as far as I know they have never seen a goat

Glad to see you on here and posting Princess, just a couple of quick points:  Don't ever let mom sell my fishing stuff for what I TOLD her I paid for it.  Don't ever tell her about the "sacraficing a virgin" post (or there will be a big sale on all of my stuff)  You have just joined one of the finest, most generous groups of people I have ever had the pleasure of knowing! I know you will fit right in here.
Well........ welcome to the board. Glad to have you.   dsn
HiTeresa,  I also grew up in the French River area. Welcome aboard.

Awe shucks Cliff...T'wernt nuttin'...  Welcome Teressa...your Dad and Sue have become good friends of Maribeth and me for some time now...Great peoples  Them and Jack (Nanook) and Jackie are the reason we moved up this way...of course, being close to good fishing helped too...
Welcome Aboard, the more the marrier Richard
Welcome to the boards!
Welcome to the board, good to see more women fishing.
Welcome aboard Teressa. Look forward to some reports from your neck of the woods.

Welcome Aboard Teressa !  I met your dad a few years back while fishin just off his dock .. and replied (via my blackberry) to an ad he posted about a 9.9hp  for sale ... you shoulda seen the look on the owner's face when I returned his boat rental later that day and took an outboard from the boat into my car ... I can just bet what he musta thought  Anyhow ... you'll enjoy this place .. lots of fine folk and plenty of hard/soft water trash-talk  Jon.

Thank you all for the warm welcome. If I ever say anything anyone takes offense to, feel free to steal some of Dad's spots, I'd say you can slap him for it, but well, that wouldn't be very nice of me . Seriously though I look forward to getting to know you and read your posts and contribute where I can. At the very least, I'll be able to pick up some good info for blackmailing Dad.
Hi Teressa, welcome to OFC! I hope you can catch fish better than the old boy  S.

Hi Teressa,  Welcome aboard and I need to advise you of something that will be critical to your survival on this board.  Do yourself a great big favor and do not post any reports of walleye that you catch (that would be suicidal)..............you will no longer be Daddy's little girl.  Regards, Sam
Welcome to the family Teressa!  i finaly got to meet your dad, mom and andy. they are great people (andy included). are you coming to the g2g with cliff?

Hey Cliff .....send me a brand new 9.9 outboard or ill tell your daughter about the time you were "playing" with her goats when they werent home  Im with ya on the extortion Teressa   .....welcome aboard
Oh Lord what have I done? LOL
